def.dt: :meat from a cow a pound of beef ground beef I'm not eating as much beef as I used to. often used before another noun the beef industry beef stew [=a stew made with beef]
:complaint My real beef is with the organization's president, not the group itself. What's your beef?
:muscles a football player with a lot of beef and brawn [=a very muscular football player]
:to add weight, strength, or power to (something) Security around the city will be beefed up during the event. The medicine helps beef up the immune system.
:smoked dried beef that is sliced thin
:beef that has been preserved in salt water a slice of corned beef a corned beef sandwich
